name: Wonderful Duck
description:
Help the little but still marvellous duck to reach babes on the beach by collapsing through space and time and collecting enough coins!

Controls:  SPACEBAR
just hit spacebar, pro-tip - harder you press higher you jump, use double-jump ;)

No 21:9 ultrawide support yet, sorry :(

STILL WIP , being developed for the I can't draw game jam
